Welcome

Nice job registering. Now it's all for free. Get access for millions of songs anytime, anywhere. Have Fun with Scatter Plot.

This is a school project, threfore we have no stored libraries for music. But please don't be disappointed. Below here is an iframe through which you can access google to look for your favourite songs. Thanks, for your understanding.
